short_summary: Layout of non-assigned workstation - 7th Floor Quebec
description: This bid solicitation is issued in accordance with the conditions of the Supply Arrangement E60PQ-120001/G. This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 50000068727 dated 2022-12-09 with a closing of 2022-12-23 at 02:00PM. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offereurs/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

### Background

The **Ministère de l'Environnement et des Changements climatiques (MECC)**, Environment Canada, has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the `Layout of non-assigned Workstation - 7th Floor Quebec`.

### Tender Details

- **Reference Number:** PW-23-01020351
- **Solicitation Number:** 5000068727/B
- **Publication Date:** 2023-01-06
- **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2023-01-19, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
- **Amendment Number/Date:** 2/2023-01-17

### Tender Description

This bid solicitation is related to the Supply Arrangement E60PQ-120001/G. Previous bid solicitation number 5000068727 (dated December 9, 2022) has been annulled and superseded by this document. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to bidders who participated in the previous solicitation upon request.

### Technical Information

- **Service:** Furnishing, Installation and Removal of office chairs (CHAIR)
- **Region of Delivery:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Bidding Information

For documents and information, please visit [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Mandatory documents are attached.

### Contact Information

For questions or further information, please contact:

- **Name:** Chenier, Carolyne
- **Email:** Carolyne.Chenier@ec.gc.ca
- **Contact URL:** N/A

### Tender Documents

Please find attached the solicitation documents:

- [Solicitation document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/06/ab7b104ac4757588b6848f1d5ab7dfef/solicitation_5000068727-b_en.pdf)
- [RFQ Amendment 1 document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/c20973f446547535597fffc37a0132c3/5000068727b_rfp_amendment001_en.pdf)
